data.text: @DavePriceTV @katiecouric @TODAYshow @NBCNewYork https://t.co/gEbEGLaLNZ #mikecstrong please read about my little boy

@DavePriceTV @drallysonocean @katiecouric @TODAYshow @NBCNewYork Thank u 4 helping 2 raise awareness 4 cancer research funding. Lost my dad 2 pancreatic cancer in 2011, 9 mos. from diagnosis & my mom 2 lung cancer in 2015, 4 weeks from diagnosis. Running my 1st ever full marathon in NYC on 11/4 for  @Run4Purple https://t.co/p75nge6H4W
